summary:
Capital Change Notice Summary (Options Grant):
- Options Issued: 3,059,190 (10.6% of total outstanding Options).
- Exercise Price: NZD $0.65 (VWAP 5 days pre-26 May 2025).
- Exercise Period: 10 business days post-2028 results announcement, lasting 90 days.
- Settlement: Cashless (net-settled), with shares issued based on market value vs. exercise price.
- Tax Treatment: OCA covers tax on employee benefits; shares reduced if NZ tax > OCA’s tax savings.
- Purpose: Employee retention, performance alignment, and long-term incentive.
- New Shares Rank: Equal to existing ordinary shares.

No material liquidity/capital structure impact; no trading action required.

• Divestment of HTAL Stake: Spark New Zealand selling its 10% stake in Hutchison Telecommunications (Australia) Limited (HTAL) to Hutchison Telecommunications (Amsterdam) BV.
  • Sale Price: A$0.032 per share (45% premium to Independent Expert’s upper valuation range, 39% premium to 3-month VWAP).
  • Proceeds: NZ$47 million expected in July 2025, to be used for Net Debt Reduction.
  • Rationale: Part of strategic review of non-core assets.

(No timetable or capital-raising details; purely an asset sale announcement.)

Material Information Summary – Scheme of Arrangement

Key Terms:

  • Acquirer: Shift4 Payments, LLC (NASDAQ-listed US payment processor).
  • Offer: NZ$1.20 per share in cash via scheme of arrangement.
  • Implied Equity Value: ~A$274.1m / NZ$296.4m (~14.2x FY25 Normalised EBITDA).
  • Premium: 46.5% to 90-day VWAP (prior to announcement).

Conditions & Approvals Required:

  • Shareholder approval (75% votes cast, >50% shares voted).
  • NZ High Court approval and Overseas Investment Act consent.
  • No Material Adverse Change (MAC) or Prescribed Occurrences (e.g., insolvency, capital changes).

Key Dates (Indicative):

  • Scheme Meeting: Q3 2025 (detailed timeline pending).
  • Implementation: Q4 2025 if approved.

Recommendations & Support:

  • Board: Unanimously recommends (subject to Independent Adviser’s valuation confirming fairness).
  • Major Shareholder: Microequities Asset Management (13.3% stake) intends to vote in favor.

Other Material Terms:

  • Exclusivity: "No-shop" clause with fiduciary exceptions for Superior Proposals.
  • Break Fees: ~NZ$2.96m payable by either party under specified conditions.

No material operational or financial updates provided.

Note: All figures assume NZD:AUD = 0.9248 (as of 19 June 2025).

Drilling Update Announcement (Material Information Only):

  • Drilling commenced at Bousquet Gold Project (Quebec, Canada); initial phase of 2,400m (10 holes) targeting Paquin and Decoeur Prospects.
  • Approval received for broader program: 10,000m (38 holes) across high-priority gold targets.
  • Paquin Prospect: High-grade intercepts historically include 9m @ 16.96g/t Au; drilling to test strike extension.
  • Location: Project situated on Cadillac Break, a structure linked to major gold deposits (>110Moz Au).

No material financial, capital, or trading-impacting details disclosed.
